words.source: H3045 conj. + Qal perf. 3cp of יָדַע 'to know'; KJV 'shall know', ESV 'shall know', NASB 'will know'
H4713 gentilic noun מִצְרִי 'Egyptian'; KJV 'the Egyptians', ESV 'the Egyptians', NASB 'the Egyptians'
H3588 conj. כִּי 'that, because'; KJV 'that', ESV 'that', NASB 'that'
H589 pers. pron. 1cs אֲנִי 'I'; KJV 'I am', ESV 'I am', NASB 'I am'
H3068 divine name, Tetragrammaton; KJV 'the LORD', ESV 'the LORD', NASB 'the LORD'
H5186 prep. b- + Qal inf. constr. + 1cs suff. of נָטָה 'to stretch out'; KJV 'when I stretch forth', ESV 'when I stretch out', NASB 'when I stretch out'
H853 direct object marker; untranslated in English versions
H3027 n.fs constr. + 1cs suff. יָד 'hand'; KJV 'mine hand', ESV 'my hand', NASB 'my hand'
H5921 prep. עַל 'upon, over, against'; KJV 'upon', ESV 'against', NASB 'on'
H4714 proper name; all trans. agree
H3318 conj. + Hiphil perf. 1cs of יָצָא 'to go out'; KJV 'and bring out', ESV 'and bring … out', NASB 'and bring … out'
H853 direct object marker; untranslated in English versions
H1121 n.mp constr. בֵּן 'son'; KJV 'the children of', ESV 'the people of', NASB 'the sons of'
H3478 proper name; all trans. agree
H8432 prep. min + n.ms constr. תָּוֶךְ 'midst' + 3mp suff.; KJV 'from among them', ESV 'from among them', NASB 'from their midst'
